name: Gnome Extermination Company
description:
You have been hired by the Gnome Extermination Company to clear out a research facility that has been overrun with garden gnomes. In a mission gone wrong, your new objective is to get out alive. The gnomes are hungry for toes, so you better hurry...

Shoot gnomes, buy upgrades, and pray to the Gnome God in this fast paced shooter. Inspired by games such as Doom, Call of Duty, and The Binding Of Isaac, Gnome Extermination Company was created by Skyler Clark and Jared Slattery.

If you would like to give feedback or suggestions, we would love to hear what you have to say!
